sn35.77:1.1: “Yaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.3: Cakkhu kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.7: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassa …pe… adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.77:1.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.77:1.13: Yaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
